img.title: Dear MPLSD Families, Greetings! The purpose of this communication is to share information regarding three important matters. First, with regard to the popcorn fundraiser that benefits the Lori Carnevale Memorial Scholarship, those community members wh
img.alt: Dear MPLSD Families, Greetings! The purpose of this communication is to share information regarding three important matters. First, with regard to the popcorn fundraiser that benefits the Lori Carnevale Memorial Scholarship, those community members wh

div.span: Greetings! The purpose of this communication is to share information regarding three important matters.

First, with regard to the popcorn fundraiser that benefits the Lori Carnevale Memorial Scholarship, those community members who ordered items will be able to pick them up this coming Saturday, April 18th, from 10:00 a.m. until 12:00 p.m. (i.e., noon) at the Intermediate School cafeteria doors. We ask that people please remain in their cars, as orders will be brought to you. Again, the grades K-6 popcorn fundraiser order pick-up is this Saturday, April 18th, from 10:00 a.m. until 12:00 p.m.

Second, students who are working on paper assignments may turn those in at the food distribution locations on Wednesday afternoons from 4:00 p.m. through 5:00 p.m. Additionally, Ms. Boerger and Mr. Miller will have boxes in front of the high school office for students in grades 7-12 and the intermediate school office for students in grades K-6 to submit assignments there on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from 10:00 a.m. until 12:00 p.m. (i.e., noon). Please place the assignments in an envelope, folder, or gallon-size plastic bag with the student’s name and the teacher’s name so that we can send them to the proper teacher and so that the correct student is given credit.

Third, and the final item for today, we will again be delivering food this week to Madison-Plains Local School District students who are in need at our seven food distribution locations. Delivery is tomorrow, Wednesday, April 15, from 4:00 p.m. until 5:00 p.m. Any Eagle Nation student who is in need is welcome to come to one of the locations and receive food; students do not need to be on any particular list to receive this service. Additionally, parents and guardians are able to pick-up food for their children without the children being there.
I will continue to be in touch with more updates in the coming days.
I hope you and your family are able to stay healthy and safe!

img.title: The Lori Carnevale Memorial Scholarship Popcorn Fundraiser orders will be delivered this Friday and will be available for pickup on Saturday, April 18th from 10:00am - Noon at the Madison-Plains Intermediate Cafeteria. You will need to park by the cafeter
img.alt: The Lori Carnevale Memorial Scholarship Popcorn Fundraiser orders will be delivered this Friday and will be available for pickup on Saturday, April 18th from 10:00am - Noon at the Madison-Plains Intermediate Cafeteria. You will need to park by the cafeter

div.span:
The Lori Carnevale Memorial Scholarship Popcorn Fundraiser orders will be delivered this Friday and will be available for pickup on Saturday, April 18th from 10:00am - Noon at the Madison-Plains Intermediate Cafeteria. You will need to park by the cafeteria doors as the orders will be brought out through this location.
We will be enforcing safe distancing and ask for your patience ahead of time.
Thank you for your support!
Nothing but love from our K6 Staff! Click on More+!

img.title: Dear MPLSD Parents and Guardians, Good afternoon! Just a quick reminder that our staff members will be at our seven food distribution locations today, Wednesday, April 8th, beginning at 4:00 p.m. and will be there until 5:00 p.m. Also, a quick reminder
img.alt: Dear MPLSD Parents and Guardians, Good afternoon! Just a quick reminder that our staff members will be at our seven food distribution locations today, Wednesday, April 8th, beginning at 4:00 p.m. and will be there until 5:00 p.m. Also, a quick reminder

div.br: Good afternoon! Just a quick reminder that our staff members will be at our seven food distribution locations today, Wednesday, April 8th, beginning at 4:00 p.m. and will be there until 5:00 p.m. Also, a quick reminder that our London location has been moved to the Church of Christ in Christian Union at 180 West Center Street in London. Also a point of clarification, we are pleased to serve any student who is in need. They do not need to be on any particular list. Students who are in need, or their parent or guardian, are welcome to come to one of our seven food distribution locations and receive food.

span.div:
Chad Eisler, Superintendent
Madison-Plains Local School District

span.div: If you see something, say something. Call 800-4-1-VOICE, ext. 359 or text TIPS to 66746 any time of the day or night to report information that might impact the safety of our schools.
